fields.title: Jozi Jerk Chicken
fields.description: A spicy, tangy chicken dish with a Caribbean twist, served with rice and peas.

fields.title: Boerie Bao Buns
fields.description: Soft steamed buns stuffed with spiced boerewors slices, tangy chakalaka, and a hint of soy glaze.

fields.title: Soweto Souvlaki
fields.description: Greek-style grilled chicken skewers marinated with rooibos and lemon, served with vetkoek pita.

fields.title: Bunny Burger
fields.description: Think Durban bunny chow, but burger-style: a curried beef patty topped with fresh coriander and mango atchar.

fields.title: Ndebele Nachos
fields.description: Mexican tortilla chips loaded with cheesy chakalaka, jalapeños, and creamy guacamole.

fields.title: Cape Malay Curry Pizza
fields.description: Thin crust, topped with spiced chicken curry, fresh coriander, and sweet apricot chutney.

fields.title: Pap & Kimchi Bowl
fields.description: Creamy pap topped with spicy Korean kimchi, crispy pork belly, and sesame seeds.

fields.title: Bobotie Empanadas
fields.description: Hand pies stuffed with Cape Malay bobotie mince, served with a chutney dip.

fields.title: Masala Ramen
fields.description: Japanese noodles in a Durban masala-infused broth, with soft egg and grilled mutton strips.

fields.title: Rooibos Ribs
fields.description: Tender pork ribs slow-braised in rooibos and honey glaze, finished on the braai.

fields.title: Gatsby Wrap
fields.description: A Cape Town gatsby reimagined as a portable wrap, stuffed with chips, steak, and spicy mayo.

fields.title: Moroccan Mielie Salad
fields.description: Charred corn tossed with cumin, coriander, and a creamy yogurt dressing.

fields.title: Madiba Mac & Cheese
fields.description: American-style mac and cheese with biltong bits and a hint of smoked paprika.

fields.title: Pretoria Pad Thai
fields.description: Thai stir-fried noodles tossed with peanuts, bean sprouts, and sosatie-spiced chicken.

fields.title: Zulu Zinger Wings
fields.description: Crispy wings coated in a tangy peri-barbeque sauce, with a touch of wild honey.

fields.title: Bunny Bao Sliders
fields.description: Mini bao buns filled with curry lamb, pickled carrots, and coriander cream.

fields.title: Chakalaka Chimichangas
fields.description: Crispy fried wraps stuffed with spicy chakalaka and pulled chicken, served with sour cream.

fields.title: Durban Fish Tacos
fields.description: Soft tortillas with battered hake, mango salsa, and a peri-lime drizzle.

fields.title: Vetkoek Philly Cheesesteak
fields.description: A Philly classic meets SA — vetkoek stuffed with tender beef strips, onions, and melted cheese.

fields.title: Malva Pudding Milkshake
fields.description: A thick vanilla milkshake blended with chunks of malva pudding and caramel sauce.
